findings.rationale: An indefinite term may pose a risk as it can lead to uncertainty regarding the obligations of the Receiving Party and the potential for perpetual liability.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Clarity on Information Return
findings.rationale: The requirement to return all Confidential Information upon termination may be vague, leading to disputes over what constitutes 'all' information.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
